BrightBlade, Rage

* BrightBlade snarled in anger as Teltoli had run off, how dare that Maximal 
fun from battle!
She stomped her foot and threw her fist into the boulder, this was not fair! 
She wanted to attack the Maximal and even perhaps bring the head of her 
catch back to Hell Beast, what a trophy that would make!
BrightBlade growled as she drew her fist back from the rock, her knuckles a 
little split and bleeding.
She walked over to Gangon and shook his shoulder...*

" Hay! Wake up!"

* She had heard the command from Rampage to fall back and she thought it 
wise to do so, but she was so proud that they had won anyway!
BrightBlade shook her partner's shoulder again, it was now time to go back 
for repairs.*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage watched as Scourge began to run towards the Predacon base, was she 
requested to follow?
His words were now understandable but they were still a little hard to 
grasp, but she now felt shaken and vulnerable in this new form. She didn't 
want to be left alone, not like this!
Rage then began to follow Scourge towards the Pred base, at least she then 
was with something that could help her understand this new body.*
